and says she can see similarities between her on-screen role and the pop mogul. "If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell ," Jane Lynch explains. You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character. Jane Lynch went on to tell The Sun: " Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. Just like him, she says what she wants because she can. Jane Lynch also spoke about Glee fans who are petitioning to have Sue appear as a judge on Simon Cowell 's show The X Factor. Simon Cowell is the boss of this show. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl Cole . The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk."*** The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen. As soon as it's announced she's going to be a judge the plan will be to launch her music career in the States. It's important Americans realize she's a credible music star if she's going to be judging other singers. *** Simon Cowell is said to be trying to find a way for him and Cheryl Cole to carry on starring in the British version of the show alongside the US program.
